verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> in my <S%H7879>complaint;<s%> <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> my <S%H9132>life<s%> from <S%H6343>dread<s%> of the <S%H340>enemy.<s%>
<S%H5641>Hide<s%> me from the <S%H5475>secret<s%> <S%H5475>counsel<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> From the <S%H9543>tumult<s%> of those who <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%>
<S%H834>Who<s%> have <S%H8150>sharpened<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> like a <S%H2719>sword.<s%> They <S%H1869>aimed<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H1697>speech<s%> [as] their <S%H2671>arrow,<s%>
To <S%H3384>shoot<s%> from <S%H4565>concealment<s%> at the <S%H8535>blameless;<s%> <S%H6597>Suddenly<s%> they <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at him, and do not <S%H3372>fear.<s%>

They <S%H2388>hold<s%> <S%H2388>fast<s%> to themselves an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>purpose;<s%> They <S%H5608>talk<s%> of <S%H2934>laying<s%> <S%H4170>snares<s%> <S%H2934>secretly;<s%> They <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> can <S%H7200>see<s%> them?"

They <S%H2664>devise<s%> <S%H9390>injustices,<s%> [saying,] "We are <S%H8552>ready<s%> with a well-conceived <S%H2665>plot<s%>"; For the <S%H7130>inward<s%> <S%H7130>thought<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H6013>deep.<s%>
But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at them with an <S%H2671>arrow;<s%> <S%H6597>Suddenly<s%> they will be <S%H4347>wounded.<s%>
So they will make him <S%H3782>stumble;<s%> Their own <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> them; <S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H7200>see<s%> them will <S%H5074>shake<s%> the head.

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> will <S%H3372>fear,<s%> And will <S%H5046>declare<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> And will <S%H7919>consider<s%> <S%H4639>what<s%> He has <S%H4639>done.<s%>

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and will <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Him; And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H1984>glory.<s%>
